Job Title: Senior Software Engineer - Core Network Software Development
Job Description:
Senior Software Engineer -  Core Network Software Development (4G/ IoT/ 5G) Job Description 

The Core Network software stack (Core) team at Azcoms India Development Center owns the design,  development and delivery of the 4G,  5G and IoT Core Network protocol stacks and applications for Azcoms own products as well as for Azcoms design services customers. The team prides itself on successful high- quality product delivery to extremely demanding customers,  including those in the aerospace domain. Core networks are becoming increasingly critical in virtualised environments,  where new feature delivery and customer value addition is preferably cloud- based. NFV and SDN are key to success in the networks of tomorrow. 

As part of the Core team,  you will participate in all phases of the software development life cycle and be responsible for delivering high quality,  optimized software components and subsystems for Core Network,  such as S1AP,  NAS,  GTP,  MME,  Gateways,  HSS,  etc. You are expected to handle technical interactions with Azcoms global customers off- site and on- site.

You should have a solid grip on software architecture and design best practices,  and possess in- depth knowledge of the 4G,  5G and IoT domains and applicable technical standards.

Senior Software Engineers should possess 2- 4 years of relevant work experience,  i.e. implementation of one or more core network functional nodes in server- based or cloud environments.
